original_definition: 'Waste' means any substance or object in the categories set out in Annex I to Directive 2006/12/EC which the holder discards or intends, or is required, to discard;
generated_definition: 'Waste' means any substance or object which the holder discards or intends to discard, is no longer required for its original purpose, and has the potential to pose a risk to the environment or human health.

Article 2: ‘Waste’ means any substance or object in the categories set out in Annex I to Directive 2006/12/EC which the holder discards or intends, or is required, to discard;
